Shiny (apps for) dendrochronology

Author
Affiliation
Ronald M. Visser

Saxion University of Applied Sciences

Published

July 24, 2025

This page contains links to Shiny-apps for dendrochronology, but that are not released as a package to install. Some are also listed here: https://opendendro.org/apps.

Name of shiny app

Description1

Links

Github
iDetrend A Shiny app for interactively detrending tree-ring data using dplR. Website GitHub
treeSong A Shiny app for converting the spectral properties of tree-ring data into audio. GitHub
xDateR A Shiny app for graphically and statistically crossdating tree-ring data using dplR. Website GitHub

Footnotes

  1. Descriptions are based on the original descriptions by the author(s).↩︎
